ygData.subject: Re: Necro Research Only Spells.
ygData.msgSnippet: decay, dont bother to read those books lah... u just use the rite components... put em into the Book of Dark Bindings... and click combine... if u suceed... u
ygData.messageBody:
decay,
dont bother to read those books lah... u just use the rite components... put em into the Book of Dark Bindings... and click combine... if u suceed... u get the thing... if not... u get nothing...

certain books requires certain languages to read... since i never bother to read those research books... i dont know which language is for which... but i have heard some in Old Erudin, Dragon, Elder Dragon, Elder Dark, Combine(sometihng and something)... etc...

hope this helps,
Fred
p/s : come over the Innoruuk and i help u gain some levels quick!

hi Decay here from Povar, can u tell me some combinations? i dont seem to be able to read the book of spells. should my language skills be excellent b4 i can research?
CHEERS!

Hi,
just wanna know who plays a nero on Innoruuk and needs the level 16 research only spells? if i m not wrong, i have the following 2 spells in my bank.
1. Hungry Earth
2. Banshee Aura

If u want them, pls either email me or post here and collect from me this coming weekend when i log on. Bcos my bank is all full and i need to clear some space for more research words. Otherwise just create a mule and get from me or something, if not i have to sell them to someone else that badly needs them or someone in my current guild (or soon to be previous)... first priority here... GRAB IT QUICK!
ziltus ah, those rune u want or not? take up really alot of space leh.... unless someone starts giving me 10 slot boxes or something...

cheers,
Nicademous
p/s : if anyone come across the following words, pls keep them i will pay for it! Recluse, Sentient (Beza), Absorption, Eventide, Discernment, Acquisition, Purification, Incorporeal, Possession, Haunting, Rupturing, Dissemination, Parasitism, Motion, Neglect, Endurance, Resolve, Quivering, Duration, Dark Paths, Suffering, Abatement, Efficacy, Bidding, Suffering, Collection, Descrying, Seizure, Dispellation, Projection, The Specter, Cazic-Thule, Obligation, Psyche, Burnishing, Enchantment, Subrdination, Requistion, Acquisition, Odus, Cryptic Force, Ethereal...
thast it... not alot rite? hehehe...
